import './profile.css' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import Card from '../../components/card' import {API} from '../../config/api' export default function Profile(){ const [user,setuser]=useState([]) const id = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('user')) const getuser = async () => { try { const response = await API.get(`/user/${id}`); setuser(response.data.data); console.log(response) } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; useEffect(() => { getuser(); }, []); console.log(id) return( <>
